name: obsidian-graphic-organizer
description: A graphic organizer plugin for Obsidian that provides an interactive tree view of your vault's hierarchy

scripts.package: pnpm run build && echo 'Plugin packaged in dist/ directory - copy contents to your Obsidian vault .obsidian/plugins/graphic-organizer/'
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Your Name
